main.allAtOnce: All at Once on the Web
main.objectTo3D: Turn objects around you into 3D model

service.optimizationContentFirst: We provide optimized 3D files in the desired capacity and polygons while maintaining the quality of the 3D file.
service.optimizationContentSecond: Minimize loading time and try uploading to various platforms without capacity limitation.
service.usageContentFirst: Using RebuilderAI's 3D viewer, you can easily adjust the color, shadow, and intensity of light.
service.usageContentSecond: You can add tags to the 3D product and share it. You can also use the edited 3D viewer in online shop.
service.eCommerceMarketingContentFirstLine: Try using the photo-based 3D scanning solution
service.manufactureContentFirstLine: You can compare the 3D generated by AI with the blueprint and measure the error rate.
service.manufactureContentSecondLine: Actual test result: error rate 0.2mm (based on 20~50cm size)
service.damageContentFirstLine: You can analyze damage caused by car accident
service.damageContentThirdLine: You can determine the extent of the damage to each part of the vehicle.
service.labelingContentFirstLine: You can synthesize multi-view images in various environments
service.labelingContentSecondLine: to build simulation data and use it for artificial intelligence training.
service.labelingContentThirdLine: Try building data to improve AI performance more easily based on 3D.
service.imageExplanation: Synthetic image for machine learning created by combining with NVIDIA Omniverse program

about.motoSecond: we are creating a new online experience
about.motoThird: RebuilderAI generates new values in new markets and is comprised of people building the future.
about.workFirstContent: The RebuilderAI team doesn't have a hierarchical structure. However, we do have representatives and leaders for each position and project. These leaders grow with their team members under a shared vision and structure. Our team members address each other respectfully and value each other's thoughts.
about.workSecondContent: At RebuilderAI, work hours are flexible. Each person sets their own weekly goals and regularly shares their direction and work content with the team. Everyone is encouraged to bring new ideas to their projects and make evidence-based decision.
about.workThirdContent: RebuilderAI grows as a team. Our community is made up of outstanding colleagues with diverse strengths who learn from each other and grow together. We're all striving to create a culture where we can enjoy our work and grow continuously.
about.benefitsTitleSecondLine: to focus in their work and grow
about.benefitsFirstContent: We respect the individual's optimal working hours to ensure a balanced work schedule.
about.benefitsSecondContent: We provide everything necessary for you to focus in your work.
about.benefitsThirdContent: We pursue growth. The company invests generously in personal development.
about.benefitsFourthContent: We offer a variety of welfare benefits to promote individual health and happiness.
about.historyTitle: RebuilderAI is writing a new history right now

career.lookingForCrew: Looking for colleagues to pioneer new markets together
career.pleaseApply: If you agree with the values and culture that the RebuilderAI team pursues, don't hesitate to apply.

contact.inquire: Please inquire about any questions regarding VRIN 3D
contact.title: Title
contact.titlePlaceholder: Please enter the title of the inquiry
contact.personName: Name of the Person in Charge
contact.contentPlaceholder: Please enter the content of the inquiry accurately and specifically. The person in charge will contact you after review.
contact.agreeFirst: I agree that RebuilderAI will collect, use and retain my personal data as below in accordance with RebuilderAI’s Privacy Policy.
contact.agreeThird: Purpose of collection and use: service information, service office and conducting marketing communications
contact.agreeFourth: Retention and use period: until the end of service process and marketing communications, or as necessary for legal obligations or limited business purposes (see above privacy policy for more details)
contact.locationDetail: NAVER 1784, 95 Jeongjail-ro, Bundang-gu, Seongnam-si, Gyeonggi-do, Republic of Korea
